summary: Ghosts are more scary as they are immune to ordinary weapons!
descriptionHtml:
Basically, this mod is made by requests but I find it to be quite quaint, so I just upload it here for those who interested.

This mod causes Skyrim ghosts to be akin to those in Oblivion in that they are completely immune to ordinary weapons and all forms of bashing. The weapons listed below can damage but not bash them:

- All Dragonbone, Daedric and Silver weapons
- All Daedric artifacts and Auriel Bow
- Ghostblade, Drainblood Axe, Drainheart Sword and Drainspell Bow
- Mystic Bound weapons (Mystic Binding perk)
- Keening, Harkon sword and Rueful Axe

Enchanted weapons will only do magical damage if not among those listed above.

Like Darksoul, two items are added to help kill ghosts: Ghost\'s Essence (chance to be dropped by ghosts) and Transient Curse (purchasable from Falion and Enthir). These two items put a curse on player for a certain amount of time which allows attacking and bashing ghosts with any weapons but there is drawback, so be careful.

Requirement:
Dawnguard DLC

Uninstallation:
- Open console and type: player.removeperk x014a3a
- Uncheck the mod.
